import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react' import Table from './table' import Socket from '../socket' import checada from '../../../../backend/src/models/checada' export default function Asistencia() { const [checadas,setChecadas] = useState() useEffect(()=>{ const res = axios.get('http://localhost:4000/api/users') setChecadas(res.data) }) Socket.on('checada',(data)=>{ setChecadas(checadas) }) return (

Asistencias

{checada} ) }
